## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G47350](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G47350)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHSD2, HSD2</u>
- **Gene Name:** HYDROXYSTEROID DEHYDROGENASE 2, hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase 2
- **Description:**   hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2099510
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
